tha-ap214:0.3_0: held together by lay people, whose partners and seniors.
tha-ap214:1.2_0: A long time those who see
tha-ap214:2.1_0: Though this sacrifice has been given up,
tha-ap214:2.2_0: the world doesn’t stay in the world.
tha-ap214:2.4_0: There is fruit of past deeds.
tha-ap214:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap214:5.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap214:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Pajjota.
